Text:
Thanks mac.moe. I've been trying to get a hold of this.

Thanks for the rest of the shows. If you take requests, any chance you can fit Panorama in? We can't get that over here and the usual uploaders seem to have dropped it completely over the last few weeks.

A present from an Aberdeen fan to a teddy bear !!.

I take no pleasure from the crisis at Ibrox 
:-))

I'll see what I can do with Panorama for you.

Where are you ?
